title: Remote/Blended Learning Design Strategies for Advanced Science Learners in the Pandemic Era

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced Expertise in Scientific Fields and Basic Online Learning Tool Proficiency
context.additional_context: Digital devices are provided, but the remote environment requires fostering interaction and deep learning among small groups of learners

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more educational technology principles to consider when designing remote/blended learning in pandemic situations
Learners can design learning activities using two or more real-time collaboration tools applicable to science subjects
Learners can propose learning outcome measurement strategies by applying a feedback-based formative assessment design framework
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
